DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the effect of the treatment with GrindcareÂ® on the parafunction of the muscles- and jaw activity (Bruxism) during sleep.
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial of the Optimal Treatment Period and Long-term Efficacy of Functional Electrical Stimulation (FES) on Sleep Bruxism
DOC.criteria: RDCTMD diagnosis Verified sleep bruxism More than 18 Years Signed ICF Contraindication of concomitant medication and diseases judged by investigator Pacemaker
